documents.document: @HardyEustace05 Hi ‘generic name’, what we do know is that the county board brought in a well renowned and experienced independent mediator to listen to all sides.

@joannetyrrrell @ponyyelof @OfftheBenchOTB Yeah agree, everyone knew there are confidentiality agreements so can’t understand rush to sanction
@ConorMcCaff4 @TwinGooners Because I’d imagine the ultimate aim is to try to resolve it first which must be respected
@stephen_sharpe Yeah hard to escape that impression with the decision to punish club/players
@TwinGooners Which is why the rush to punish is all the more baffling
